7.3 DUIM-Layouts Module

<null-pane>

Sealed instantiable class

Summary

The class of null panes.

Superclasses

<leaf-pane>

Init-keywords

None.

Library

duim-layouts

Module

duim-layouts

Description

The class of null panes. This class acts as a filler: use it when you need to "fill space" somewhere in a complex layout.

Operations

None.

See also

<spacing>, page 647

with-spacing, page 697

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
